item.title: Podcasting for free (what is essential)
item.description: » What is a podcast? « Technically, a podcast is just a list of audio files, listed on a RSS feed. But maybe this is too simplistic. Let’s state the most important things about podcasting, in 3 different categories: essential, recommended, optional. "Dog Looking at and Listening to a Phonograph” by Beverly & Pack is licensed under CC BY 2.0 Essential Content The most important thing in a podcast is the content - it is the podcast soul and it is what listeners get.

item.title: How to make a podcast
item.description: Have you ever asked yourselves how to create a podcast? Or how much does it cost? or would I be able to create one myself? This is (will be) a series of technical articles about everything involved in producing a podcast, from recording to publishing. It will show how Marmita de Redon (a portuguese podcast about 90s and 2000s) was created and published. This will mainly answer the following question: How do you make a podcast (for free)?
